projects.title: Clock Master - Custom Clock
projects.description: Clock Master is the ultimate time utility app, combining five essential functions in one convenient package. With Timmer, World Clock, Alarm, Stopwatch & Always On Display this app has everything you need to manage time effectively and stay organized.
projects.detailed_des:
WeatherApp

A simple weather application that fetches weather data using APIs and displays it in a user-friendly manner. Developed by Vijay Mudgal.

View on GitHub

Overview

This app fetches real-time weather data from various APIs and displays it in an easy-to-read format. Users can check the weather based on their location or search for other cities globally. The app includes features like temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather conditions, all in one interface.

Tech Stack

  • Java
  • Retrofit
  • Android SDK
  • Google Maps API
  • Firebase

Features

  • Real-time weather data: Fetches current weather conditions from a reliable source.
  • Location-based forecast: Displays weather based on the user's location or search query.
  • Temperature, humidity, and wind speed: Offers detailed metrics about the weather.
  • Intuitive UI: Simple and easy-to-use design to navigate the app's features.

projects.title: J-stan
projects.description: Locally Network Movies streaming system for house,office movie night
projects.detailed_des:
Aora

The Video Sharing App is an engaging platform that empowers users to connect through video content. It allows users to seamlessly upload, view, and share videos with others in the app's community, fostering creativity and interaction.

React-NativeExpoAppWriteNativeWindAnimatable

Overview

Built using React Native, this app delivers a fast, responsive, and platform-agnostic experience, making it accessible across Android and iOS devices. By leveraging modern video streaming technologies, the app ensures smooth playback and minimal buffering, even on low-bandwidth networks.



Design Screen

Tech Stack

  • React Native
  • Expo
  • Nativewind
  • Animatable
  • Appwrite


Features

  • Onboarding Screen: Engaging graphics and clear instructions welcome users to the app.
  • Robust Authentication & Authorization System: Secure email login safeguards user accounts.
  • Dynamic Home Screen with Animated Flat List: Smoothly animated flat list showcases the latest videos for seamless browsing.
  • Pull-to-Refresh Functionality: Users can refresh content with a simple pull gesture for up-to-date information.
  • Full-Text Search Capability: Efficiently search through videos with real-time suggestions and instant results.
  • Tab Navigation: Navigate between sections like Home, Search, and Profile with ease using tab navigation.
  • Post Creation Screen for Uploading Media: Upload video and image posts directly from the app with integrated media selection.

projects.title: Soundscape - Sleep & Meditate
projects.description: Step into a realm of tranquility with Soundscape, your all-encompassing companion for every mood and need. Immerse yourself in a carefully curated selection of sounds, meticulously designed to dissolve stress and cater to every mood and need. Craft personalized mixes using nature sounds, ambient melodies, and calming tones to create your unique auditory haven.

projects.title: Speaker Cleaner
projects.description: The Speaker Cleaner uses powerful sound wave frequencies to remove water and dust from the phone’s speaker and improve the overall quality, reducing any muffled sound.

projects.description: Font Fusion is a powerful and versatile keyboard app that allows you to express yourself in a unique and creative way. With an extensive collection of stylish fonts, customizable keyboard themes, and an added bonus of kaomoji, you can truly elevate your messages to the next level.

projects.title: Wall4All - Wallpaper Hub

With a vast collection of handpicked wallpapers, we offer a diverse range of options to suit every taste and preference. Whether you're a nature lover, a fan of abstract art, a sports enthusiast, or simply looking for a captivating background, Wall4All has you covered.

projects.title: App Analytics
projects.description: At App Analytics, we strive to revolutionize mobile app testing by offering developers and QAs a seamless platform to deliver high-quality applications efficiently. Our advanced testing infrastructure enables comprehensive testing across 1,500+ mobile devices and browsers, helping teams ensure compatibility, performance, and reliability for their apps.
